nodes.text: Sunflare was Sunny Bounder's personal swoop. Originally manufactured by Mobquet Swoops and Speeders, this Flare-S had been heavily modified by Bounder and the gifted swoop mechanic Grinder, both of whom were members of the criminal swoop gang, the Black Seraphs. It was extremely fast and nimble enough to handle corners and turns extremely well.

Sunflare is described in the role playing game modular encounter scenario Taming the Dragon as part of the Suns of Fortune supplement. It is possible for the player characters to actually obtain the swoop from Sunny Bounder if they kill her, defeat her, or trick her. It has unique status, meaning that it is one of a kind in the galaxy.
